name: About Last Night
description:
This is a submission for my first Game Jam, the theme being Deja Vu. The story is about a night out where someone got hurt. The main character wakes up the next day and tries to relive what happened to understand what's going on. 

Detectives will soon arrive, and you have to collect all the evidence in the house and think of a story to tell them, unless you can figure out what happened.
